title: Only a Developer registered with S
clause_text: Only a Developer registered with S.R.A. shall be eligible to submit a slum rehabilitation scheme. So also registered developer only shall be appointed by S.R.A., in case S.R.A. wish to develop any Slum Rehabilitation Area where no proposal is submitted.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
